narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Support Solutions INC is a Residential Treatment Facility  Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities provider based in Lewiston, ME. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $73.0M in Medicaid payments across 108K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $73.0M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
